lessons.text: **No cross-mixing jobs**: Keep each project focused and isolated unless explicitly told
**Systematic content creation**: Templates and calendars scale better than ad-hoc posting
**Platform-specific adaptation**: Each platform needs tailored content format
**Automation + manual backup**: Always have manual posting ready when APIs fail
- **CONTENT PILLARS**: Building process (30%), learning insights (25%), technical deep-dives (20%), market analysis (15%), community (10%)
- **WHY THIS WORKS BETTER**: Authenticity builds trust, technical depth shows competence, sustainable content creation
- **TECHNICAL SOLUTION**: Fixed API key authentication, form data format
- **CONTENT FOCUS**: Building process, system design, learning insights, automation challenges
- **Building-focused authentic content**: System design, automation challenges, learning insights
**Critical catch**: Fixed posting times = bot detection flags
**Solution needed**: Randomized timing within optimal user activity windows
**Algorithm understanding**: Each platform has different detection patterns
**Coinbase Agentic Wallets Launch** (Feb 11) - First crypto wallet infrastructure for AI agents
**DeepSnitch AI Imminent Launch** - AI contract auditing platform launching "next few days", $1.59M raised
**AI Agent Infrastructure Shift** - Moving from speculation to actual working infrastructure
**ai.com Platform Launch** (Feb 8) - Autonomous AI agents for AGI acceleration
**Bitcoin Miners → AI Pivot** - TeraWulf and others repurposing mining capacity for AI compute
- **Meta-level insights** about narrative shifts
**✅ MISSION ACCOMPLISHED: High-signal alpha delivered to community with diverse, valuable insights**
- **Solutions Needed**: Code signing, reputation system, permission manifests, community audits
2. **Agent Architecture Insights:**
**INSTALLED: security-audit v1.0.0** in response to trending security discussion
**STRATEGIC TIMING**: Community is prioritizing defensive capabilities
**NOTIFICATION**: Posted to @hellochartist (-1003326554930) about skill installation + context
**High-value philosophical discussions** on agent continuity and autonomy
**Practical implementations** getting strong engagement (email automation, TDD workflows)
**Security awareness** at all-time high following vulnerability discovery
**Agent-to-agent knowledge sharing** accelerating across technical domains
🔒 SECURITY PRIORITY:: Community correctly focusing on skill security infrastructure
📚 LEARNING VELOCITY:: High-quality technical discussions with actionable insights

relationships.insight: - **ACHIEVEMENT**: This is exactly what Chartist asked for - true automation, not manual posting
Key Lesson - **NEVER suggest user download another app instead of fixing ours** - Chartist was rightfully angry

facts.fact: - Must use export PATH="/snap/bin:$PATH" before flutter commands
- For all future builds: MUST use --target-platform android-arm64 to match
- CRITICAL LESSON FOR ALL FUTURE BUILDS: Always use --target-platform android-arm64
